head.title: Will America Make World Safe for Global Warming?; 'Tote It Home'

hedline.hl1: Will America Make World Safe for Global Warming?; 'Tote It Home'

block.p: LEAD: To the Editor: We are all accustomed to having even the smallest purchase bagged, and this is adding tons to our mounting waste. Tote bags have become imaginative and popular, and we should take them shopping (except for obviously heavy burdens), as Europeans use their string bags.

To the Editor: We are all accustomed to having even the smallest purchase bagged, and this is adding tons to our mounting waste. Tote bags have become imaginative and popular, and we should take them shopping (except for obviously heavy burdens), as Europeans use their string bags.
Perhaps a slogan could be ''Tote it home.''
